entries.author: john_scoles
entries.text: John's frenzied pace of postings about Moose and DistZilla continues. Check out his blogs for the newest!
entries.title: Herding Moose (Mooses?  Meece?)

entries.author: tina_muller
entries.text: Tina gives us a primer on loading untrusted YAML using various modules.
entries.title: Safely load untrusted YAML in Perl

entries.author: dan_book
entries.text: Dan releases a module to serve as a wrapper around Encode, to simplify its interface.
entries.title: Encode::Simple - Encode and decode text, simply

entries.author: saif_ahmed
entries.text: New contributor Saif Ahmed introduces GUIDeFATE, a tool for assiting in construction of GUI applications
entries.title: Guiding Fate

entries.author: liztormato
entries.text: Another great roundup of the week's Perl 6 news
entries.title: 2018.08 Perl 6’ya Giriş

entries.author: zoffix_znet
entries.text: Zoffix gives us a cheese metaphor for the Perl 6 specification--it's full of holes! Ongoing development work fills those holes, and iteratively refines the specification.
entries.title: Perl 6: On Specs, Versioning, Changes, and... Breakage
NICEPERL's lists
entries.author: miguel_prz
entries.text:
Great modules released last week;
MetaCPAN weekly report;
StackOverflow Perl report.
The NA conference will be held Sunday, 17 June, through Friday, 22 June, in Salt Lake City, Utah. This is the same hotel we were at 3 summers ago.
entries.title: The Perl Conference in North America

entries.text: We're heading to Glasgow for the European conference, and the CFP is open!
entries.title: The Perl Conference in Europe

entries.text: Come to Bern on the 7th and 8th of September for the Swiss Perl Workshop. You can register now, and the CFP is open for this workshop in this historic city.
entries.title: Swiss Perl Workshop 2018

entries.text: Coming up quick is the German Perl Workshop, 4-6 April, at the Campus Gummersbach of the Technische Hochschule Köln. A Perl 6 Hackathon will follow on the 7th of April, and the CFP has been extended to the 10th of March.
entries.title: German Perl Workshop 2018
